John 'Jack' McMorris
CEO at JunoTrade Corporation
December 6, 2008, John 'Jack' was a client of Sylvia’s

Sylvia is easily the most talented recruiter I have ever worked with, and I have worked with a lot in my career as an IT manager.  I think her speed and quality to find people is because she spends the appropriate time trying to understand the position, and tries to submit one quality resume at a time.  This is compared to other recruiters sending me a flood of resumes that I have to figure out which ones to talk to.  I have actually said no on candidates from Sylvia after reviewing resume before, only to have her push me to talk to the candidate and ended up hiring them.  Use Millennium to find your positions, you will not be sorry.

summary: As President of Millennium Group, Sylvia Kubiak manages the daily operations of the staff augmentation and direct hire business units of the company.  Sylvia brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to her role with over 25 years in specialized staffing and recruiting.  Sylvia prides herself on strategically aligning herself with her customers’ business needs, anticipating change, and creating and executing innovative cost-saving recruiting solutions. Prior to starting Millennium Group, Sylvia launched her career as an IT recruiter and quickly moved into an account management and business development role for companies such as Spherion and Computer Solutions.  A career advancement opportunity led her to USAA, a Fortune 200 insurance and financial services company, where she gained invaluable enterprise-wide corporate recruiting experience. Her personal goal is to be seen as a true partner to her customers and to always act in the best interest of her clients and consultants! Feel free to reach her at: sylvia@millgroupusa.comSpecialties:Talent Acquisition, Staff Augmentation, Specialized Recruiting Solutions, Executive Search, Payroll Services, Managed Software Development Services and Project-Based work
name: Sylvia Kubiak
title: President, The Millennium Group
